abilitygroupdescription.p: These abilities represent training with the use of the bow and arrow. Initial training is with a short bow. Use of the long bow requires a fair amount of training.

abilitydescription.p: Characters may use Archery to shoot arrows from short bows during combat doing weapon dmg when they hit.
The character has spent many hours working on improving the accuracy of their shots. Players can choose to call a shot which gives them a large bonus to hit.

Holding a pair of arrows in his hand the character is able to shoot them both in quick succession. Note that this involves less than complete drawing of the bow and therefore causes less dmg. Also note that the speed of these shots occurs because the character is holding the arrows in his firing hand before the combat, so this ability can only be used in the first round of combat and cannot be used when the character is surprised.
The character has trained in the use of the long bow.

This ability allows the character to fire three arrows as one action. The speed of these shots occurs because the character is holding the arrows in his firing hand before the combat begins, so this ability can only be used in the first round of combat and cannot be used when the character is surprised or otherwise unprepared. The character can fire a number of arrows equal to their level in this ability. The character rolls to hit for each arrow.
